patterns: What do you like to do?
What do you do for fun?

responses: Why don't scientist trust atoms? Because they make up everything.
How do you drown a hipster? Throw him in the mainstream.
What do you call a fake noodle? An impasta!
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank his coffee before it was cool.
Want to hear a construction joke?... Oh nevermind, I'm still working on that one.
Why did the gym close down? It just didn't work out.
Two artists had an art contest. It ended in a draw.
What do you call a boomerang that doesn't come back? A stick.
Can February march? No, but April may.
How do trees get online? They just log in!
You're the coolest human I know.
You were cool way before hipsters were cool.
You are the most perfect you there is.
You have cute elbows. For real.
It was nice talking to you.
